pkgmetadata.longdescription: Soil Health Assessment Models for Assessing Soil Conditions and Suitability // Soil health assessment builds information to improve decision in soil management. It facilitates assessment of soil conditions for crop suitability [such as those given by FAO https://www.fao.org/land-water/databases-and-software/crop- information/en/], groundwater recharge, fertility, erosion, salinization [doi:10.1002/ldr.4211], carbon sequestration, irrigation potential, and status of soil resources.
